about.title: Who We Are
about.description: We help companies scale their marketing efforts with AI-powered solutions.

people.label: The People
people.title: Exceptional talent. An extension of your team.
people.subtitle: Our forward-deployed expert network shapes strategy, builds agentic AI workflows, and ensures quality at scale.

process.label: The Process
process.title: Quality earns trust. Scale and speed deliver growth.
process.subtitle: A proven process to accelerate time to the outcomes you care about: AI visibility, traffic, conversions.

steps.title: Inputs & Strategy
steps.description: We learn your business, audience, and competitive landscape fast. Then we identify the opportunities that will drive the most impact.

steps.title: Calibration & Workflows
steps.description: We define quality standards and voice together. Then we build custom AI workflows with human oversight that scale quality consistently.

steps.title: Execution & Iteration
steps.description: We publish and refresh content daily. Track AI visibility, rankings, traffic, and conversions. Iterate fast based on what's working.

steps.title: Growth & Scale
steps.description: Content compounds into consistent pipeline. The system gets smarter and faster. Experts shift toward strategy and new experiments.

cta.text: Ready to see this process at work and unlock your next stage of growth?

comparison.label: Comparison
comparison.title: How we're different.
comparison.subtitle: The best of AI efficiency and human expertise, without the tradeoffs.

fit.label: Fit
fit.title: Who we're built for.
fit.subtitle: GrowthX isn't for everyone. We work best with ambitious teams who understand that content is a competitive advantage worth investing in.

items.title: You're a growth-stage company ready to scale content.
items.description: You've moved past the early startup phase and are ready to invest in scalable content systems.

items.title: You have product-market fit and need to accelerate acquisition.
items.description: Your product works, customers love it, and now you need to reach more of them efficiently.

items.title: Your current content process is a bottleneck, not a growth lever.
items.description: You know content matters but your current approach can't keep up with your growth ambitions.

items.title: You value quality and are willing to invest in doing content right.
items.description: You understand that great content requires real investment and refuse to cut corners.

items.title: You want a partner, not just a vendor.
items.description: You're looking for a team that integrates with yours and cares about your success as much as you do.

footer.text: If this sounds like you, let's talk about how GrowthX can accelerate your content engine.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing.
pricing.subtitle: Choose the engagement model that fits your needs. Scale as you grow. All plans include a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. No long-term contracts required.

plans.name: You Drive → We Guide
plans.description: Expert guidance while you maintain control of execution

plans.name: We Drive → We Guide
plans.description: We handle everything, you provide direction

plans.name: Custom
plans.description: Forward-deployed engineers, fully embedded in your team
